channel.title: Changing the "Showing" price in the store
channel.description: The title pretty much says it all, I've changed the price of rocktails so when I buy it, it does buy for 20k but it still says 600 in the shop? http://imgur.com/2okzKOy

item.title: Changing the "Showing" price in the store
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

Looks like a later revision then 317 try checking the cache to see if there’s a cached price if the cached price is 600 then make sure that your shops load your override prices.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the "Showing" price in the store
